com.oym.indoor

Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oym.indoor.Building

  • public class Building
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes all the information regarding the Building stored. As well, it includes the floors related with the building.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String TYPE
      String containing the Building type

      • getFloors

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Floor> getFloors()
        Getter for the Floor array.
        Returns:

      • getFloorsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Floor> getFloorsList()
        Getter for the Floor list.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList<Floor> ordered per floor number (smaller first)
